meanings.definition: Enroll again in a course or program.
meanings.sent1: After dropping out last semester, she decided to reenroll in the biology class.
meanings.sent2: He reenrolls in the online course every year to refresh his knowledge.
meanings.sent3: The student joked that he must have a 'reenrolls' button on his computer for all the classes he retakes.
meanings.sent4: Her determination to succeed made her feel like she could reenroll in any challenge life threw at her.
meanings.sent5: The idea of reenrolling in the dance class brought back memories of her childhood passion.

meanings.definition: To register or sign up for a class or program again.
meanings.sent1: She always reenrolls in the cooking class because she loves learning new recipes.
meanings.sent2: The student forgot to reenroll in the art workshop and missed the registration deadline.
meanings.sent3: Forgetting to reenroll in the gym membership felt like misplacing a favorite book.
meanings.sent4: The decision to reenroll in the language course was like opening a door to new opportunities.
meanings.sent5: The excitement of reenrolling in the music program was palpable in the air.
